code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import{Swiper,SwiperSlide}from'swiper/react';import'swiper/css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Featured=()=>{const[stories,setStories]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{fetch('/api/featured-stories').then(res=>res.json()).then(data=>setStories(data.slice(0,5))).catch(err=>console.error('Error fetching stories:',err));},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"carousel-wrapper",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"\uD83C\uDFCF Featured Stories"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Swiper,{spaceBetween:20,slidesPerView:1,children:stories.map(story=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(SwiperSlide,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"story-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:story.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:story.snippet}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{children:["By ",story.author]})]})},story.id))})]});};export default Featured;
